mutations.name: Chimera
mutations.description: You only manifest physical mutations, and all of your mutation choices when manifesting a new mutations are physical.
mutations.levelText: Whenever you manifest a new mutation, one of your choices will also cause you to grow a new limb at random

mutations.name: Esper
mutations.description: You only manifest mental mutations, and all of your mutation choices when manifesting a new mutation are mental.

mutations.name: Unstable Genome
mutations.description: You gain one extra mutation each time you buy this, but the mutations don't manifest right away. Whenever you gain a level, there's a 33% chance that your genome destabilizes and you get to choose from 3 random mutations.

mutations.name: Adrenal Control
mutations.description: You regulate your body's release of adrenaline.
mutations.levelText:
You can increase your body's adrenaline flow for 20 rounds.
While it's flowing, you gain +10 quickness and other physical mutations gain +1 rank.
Cooldown: 200 rounds

mutations.name: Beak
mutations.description: Your face bears a sightly beak.
mutations.levelText:
+1 Ego
You occasionally peck at your opponents.
+200 reputation with birds

mutations.name: Burrowing Claws
mutations.description: You bear spade-like claws that can burrow through the earth.
mutations.levelText:
Claw penetration vs. walls: +3
Claws destroy walls after 4 penetrating hits.
Claws are also a short-blade class natural weapon that deal 1d2 base damage to non-walls.

mutations.name: Carapace
mutations.description: You are protected by a durable carapace.
mutations.levelText:
+3 AV
-2 DV
+10 Heat Resistance
+10 Cold Resistance
You may tighten your carapace to receive double the AV bonus at a -2 DV penalty as long as you remain still.
Cannot wear body armor.
+400 reputation with tortoises

mutations.name: Corrosive Gas Generation
mutations.description: You release a burst of corrosive gas around yourself.
mutations.levelText:
Releases gas for 3 rounds
Cooldown: 40 rounds

mutations.name: Double-muscled
mutations.description: You are possessed of hulking strength.
mutations.levelText:
+2 Strength
15% chance to daze your opponent on a successful melee attack for 2-3 rounds

mutations.name: Electrical Generation
mutations.description: You accrue electrical charge that you can use and discharge to deal damage.
mutations.levelText:
Maximum charge: 4000
Accrue base 100 charge per turn
Can discharge all held charge for 1d4 damage per 1000 charge
Discharge can arc to adjacent targets dealing reduced damage, up to 1 target per 1000 charge
EMP causes involuntary discharge (difficulty 18 Willpower save)
You can drink charge from energy cells and capacitors.
You gain 100 charge per point of electrical damage taken.
You can provide charge to equipped devices that have integrated power systems.

mutations.name: Electromagnetic Pulse
mutations.description: You generate an electromagnetic pulse that disables nearby artifacts and machines.
mutations.levelText:
Area: 5x5 centered around yourself
Duration: 6-15 rounds
Cooldown: 200 rounds

mutations.name: Flaming Ray
mutations.description: You emit a ray of flame.
mutations.levelText:
Emits a 9-square ray of flame in the direction of your choice.
Damage: 1d4+1
Cooldown: 10 rounds
Melee attacks heat opponents by 2d8 degrees

mutations.name: Freezing Ray
mutations.description: You emit a ray of frost.
mutations.levelText:
Emits a 9-square ray of frost in the direction of your choice.
Damage: 1d3+1
Cooldown: 20 rounds
Melee attacks cool opponents by -1d4 degrees

mutations.name: Heightened Hearing
mutations.description: You are possessed of unnaturally acute hearing.
mutations.levelText:
You detect the presence of creatures within a radius of 5.
Chance to identify nearby detected creatures

mutations.name: Heightened Quickness
mutations.description: You are gifted with tremendous speed.
mutations.levelText: +15 Quickness

mutations.name: Horns
mutations.description: Horns jut out of your head.
mutations.levelText:
20% chance on melee attack to gore your opponent
Damage increment: 2d3
Goring attacks may cause bleeding
Horns are a short-blade class natural weapon.
+1 AV
Cannot wear helmets
+100 reputation with antelopes and goatfolk

mutations.name: Multiple Arms
mutations.description: You have an extra set of arms.
mutations.levelText: 10% chance for each extra arm to deliver an additional melee attack whenever you make a melee attack

mutations.name: Multiple Legs
mutations.description: You have an extra set of legs.
mutations.levelText:
+20 move speed
+6% carry capacity

mutations.name: Night Vision
mutations.description: You see in the dark.

mutations.name: Phasing
mutations.description: You may phase through solid objects for brief periods of time.
mutations.levelText:
Duration: 7 rounds
Cooldown: 100 rounds

mutations.name: Photosynthetic Skin
mutations.description: You replenish yourself by absorbing sunlight through your hearty green skin.
mutations.levelText:
You can bask in the sunlight instead of eating a meal to gain a special metabolizing effect for 1 day: +30% to natural healing rate and +15 Quickness
While in the sunlight, you accrue starch and lignin that you can use as ingredients in meals you cook (max 1 serving of each).
+200 reputation with roots, trees, vines, and the Consortium of Phyta

mutations.name: Quills
mutations.description: Hundreds of needle-pointed quills cover your body.
mutations.levelText:
300 quills
May expel 10% of your quills in a burst around yourself (→0 1d3)
Regenerate quills at the approximate rate of 0.25 per round
+2 AV as long as you retain half your quills (+1 AV otherwise)
Creatures attacking you in melee may impale themselves on your quills, breaking roughly 1% of them and reflecting 3% damage per quill broken.
Cannot wear body armor
Immune to other creatures' quills

mutations.name: Regeneration
mutations.description: Your wounds heal very quickly.
mutations.levelText:
Your full natural healing rate applies in combat.
+20% faster natural healing rate
10% chance to regrow a missing limb each round
1% chance to remove a minor physical debuff at random each round

mutations.name: Sleep Gas Generation
mutations.description: You release a burst of sleep gas around yourself.
mutations.levelText:
Releases gas for 3 rounds
Cooldown 40 rounds

mutations.name: Slime Glands
mutations.description: You produce a viscous slime that you can spit at things.
mutations.levelText:
Covers an area with slime
Range: 8
Area: 3x3
Cooldown: 40 rounds
You can walk over slime without slipping.

mutations.name: Spinnerets
mutations.description: You can spin sticky silk webs.
mutations.levelText:
While spinning, you leave webs in your wake as you move.
Duration: 6 move actions
+6 to saves vs. forced movement
Cooldown: 80 rounds
You don't get stuck in other creatures' webs.
+300 reputation with arachnids

mutations.name: Stinger (Confusing Venom)
mutations.description: You bear a tail with a stinger that delivers confusing venom to your enemies.
mutations.levelText:
20% chance on melee attack to sting your opponent (→7 1d6)
Stinger is a long blade and can only penetrate once.
Always sting on charge or lunge.
Stinger applies venom on damage (only 20% chance if Stinger is your primary weapon).
May use Sting activated ability to strike with your stinger and automatically hit and penetrate.
Sting cooldown: 25
Venom confuses opponents for 2d3+2 rounds
+200 reputation with arachnids

mutations.name: Stinger (Paralyzing Venom)
mutations.description: You bear a tail with a stinger that delivers paralyzing venom to your enemies.
mutations.levelText:
20% chance on melee attack to sting your opponent (→7 1d6)
Stinger is a long blade and can only penetrate once.
Always sting on charge or lunge.
Stinger applies venom on damage (only 20% chance if Stinger is your primary weapon).
May use Sting activated ability to strike with your stinger and automatically hit and penetrate.
Sting cooldown: 25
Venom paralyzes opponents for 1d3+1 rounds
+200 reputation with arachnids

mutations.name: Stinger (Poisoning Venom)
mutations.description: You bear a tail with a stinger that delivers poisonous venom to your enemies.
mutations.levelText:
20% chance on melee attack to sting your opponent (→7 1d6)
Stinger is a long blade and can only penetrate once.
Always sting on charge or lunge.
Stinger applies venom on damage (only 20% chance if Stinger is your primary weapon).
May use Sting activated ability to strike with your stinger and automatically hit and penetrate.
Sting cooldown: 25
Venom poisons opponents for 8-12 rounds (damage increment 1d2)
+200 reputation with arachnids

mutations.name: Thick Fur
mutations.description: You are covered in a thick coat of fur, which protects you from the elements.
mutations.levelText:
+5 Heat Resistance
+5 Cold Resistance
+100 reputation with apes, baboons, bears, and grazing hedonists

mutations.name: Triple-jointed
mutations.description: Your joints stretch much further than usual.
mutations.levelText:
+2 Agility
10% chance that Sprint and skills with Agility prerequisites don't go on cooldown after use

mutations.name: Two-Headed
mutations.description: You have two heads.
mutations.levelText:
Mental actions have 20% lower action costs
50% chance initially and each round to shake off a negative mental status effect

mutations.name: Two-Hearted
mutations.description: You have two hearts.
mutations.levelText:
+2 Toughness
You can sprint for 30% longer.

mutations.name: Wings
mutations.description: You fly.
mutations.levelText:
You travel on the world map at 2x speed.
40% reduced chance of becoming lost
While outside, you may fly. You cannot be hit in melee by grounded creatures while flying.
5% chance of falling clumsily to the ground
+20% move speed while sprinting
You can jump 1 square farther.
You can charge 2 squares farther.
+300 reputation with birds and winged mammals

mutations.name: Beguiling
mutations.description: You beguile a nearby creature into serving you loyally.
mutations.levelText:
Mental attack versus a creature with a mind
Success roll: mutation rank or Ego mod (whichever is higher) + character level + 1d8 VS. Defender MA + character level
Range: 1
Beguiled creature: +5 bonus hit points
Cooldown: 50 rounds

mutations.name: Burgeoning
mutations.description: You cause plants to spontaneously grow in a nearby area, hindering your enemies.
mutations.levelText:
Range: 8
Area: 3x3 + growth into adjacent tiles
Cooldown: 105 rounds
+200 reputation with the Consortium of Phyta.

mutations.name: Clairvoyance
mutations.description: You briefly gain vision of a nearby area.
mutations.levelText:
Vision radius: 4
Vision duration: 20 rounds.
Cooldown: 100

mutations.name: Confusion
mutations.description: You confuse nearby enemies.
mutations.levelText:
Affected creates act semi-randomly and receive a -3 penalty to their mental abilities.
Cone angle: 30 degrees
Cone length: 4
Duration: 8-12 rounds
Cooldown: 75 rounds

mutations.name: Cryokinesis
mutations.description: You chill a nearby area with your mind.
mutations.levelText:
Chills affected area over 3 rounds
Range: 8
Area: 3x3
Round 1 Damage: 1d2 divided by 2
Round 2 Damage: 1d3 divided by 2
Round 3 Damage: 1d4 divided by 2
Cooldown: 50 rounds

mutations.name: Disintegration
mutations.description: You disintegrate nearby matter.
mutations.levelText:
Area: 7x7 around self
Damage to non-structural objects: 1d10+2
Damage to structural objects: 1d100+20
You are exhausted for 3 rounds after using this power
Cooldown: 75 rounds

mutations.name: Domination
mutations.description: You garrote an adjacent creature's mind and control its actions while your own body lies dormant.
mutations.levelText:
Mental attack versus creature with a mind
Success roll: mutation rank or Ego mod (whichever is higher) + character level + 1d8 VS. Defender MA + character level
Range: 1
Duration: 200 rounds
Cooldown: 75 rounds

mutations.name: Ego Projection
mutations.description: Through sheer force of will, you perform uncanny physical feats.
mutations.levelText:
Augments one physical attribute by an amount equal to twice your Ego bonus
Duration: 18-22 rounds
Cooldown: 200 rounds

mutations.name: Force Bubble
mutations.description: You generate a force field around your person.
mutations.levelText:
Creates a 3x3 force field centered around yourself
Duration: 12 rounds
Cooldown: 100 rounds
You may fire missile weapons through the force field.

mutations.name: Force Wall
mutations.description: You generate a wall of force that protects you from your enemies.
mutations.levelText:
Creates 9 contiguous squares of immobile force field
Duration: 16 rounds
Cooldown: 100 rounds
You may fire missile weapons through the force field.

mutations.name: Kindle
mutations.description: You ignite a small fire with your mind
mutations.levelText:
Range: 12
Cooldown: 50

mutations.name: Light Manipulation
mutations.description: You manipulate light to your advantage.
mutations.levelText:
You produce ambient light within a radius of 4.
You may focus the light into a laser beam (doing so reduces the radius of your ambient light by 1).
Laser damage increment: 1d3
Laser penetration: 4
Ambient light recharges at a rate of 1 unit every 15 rounds until it reaches its maximum value.
13% chance to reflect light-based damage

mutations.name: Mass Mind
mutations.description: You tap into the aggregate mind and steal power from other espers.
mutations.levelText:
Refreshes all mental mutations
Cooldown: 500 rounds
Cooldown is not affected by Willpower.
Each use attracts slightly more attention from psychic interlopers.
Small chance each round for another esper to steal your powers
-200 reputation with the Seekers of the Sightless Way

mutations.name: Mental Mirror
mutations.description: You reflect mental attacks back at your attackers.
mutations.levelText:
When you suffer a mental attack while Mental Mirror is off cooldown, you gain +4 mental armor (MA).
If the attack then fails to penetrate your MA, it's reflected back at your attacker.
Cooldown: 50

mutations.name: Precognition
mutations.description: You peer into your near future.
mutations.levelText:
You may activate this power and then later revert to the point in time when you activated it.
Duration between use and reversion: 16 rounds
Cooldown: 500 rounds

mutations.name: Psychometry
mutations.description: You read the history of artifacts by touching them, learning what they do and how they were made.
mutations.levelText:
Unerringly identify artifacts up to complexity tier 4.
Learn how to construct identified artifacts up to complexity tier 2 (must have the appropriate Tinker  power).
You may open security doors by touching them.

mutations.name: Pyrokinesis
mutations.description: You heat a nearby area with your mind.
mutations.levelText:
Toasts affected area over 3 rounds
Range: 8
Area: 3x3
Round 1 Damage: 1d3 divided by 2
Round 2 Damage: 1d4 divided by 2
Round 3 Damage: 1d6 divided by 2
Cooldown: 50 rounds

mutations.name: Sense Psychic
mutations.description: You can sense other mental mutants through the psychic aether.
mutations.levelText:
You detect the presence of psychic enemies within a radius of 9.
There's a chance you identify detected enemies.

mutations.name: Space-Time Vortex
mutations.description: You sunder spacetime, sending things nearby careening through a tear in the cosmic fabric.
mutations.levelText:
Summons a vortex that swallows everything in its path.
Cooldown: 500 rounds
You may enter the vortex to teleport to a random location in Qud.
+200 reputation with highly entropic beings

mutations.name: Stunning Force
mutations.description: You invoke a concussive force in a nearby area, throwing enemies back and stunning them.
mutations.levelText:
Range: 8
Area: 7x7
Creatures are pushed away from center of blast, stunned, and dealt crushing damage in up to 3 increments.
Damage increment: 1d3
Cooldown: 50 rounds

mutations.name: Sunder Mind
mutations.description: You sunder the mind of an enemy, leaving them reeling in pain.
mutations.levelText:
For up to 10 rounds, you engage in psychic combat with an opponent, dealing damage each round.
Taking any action other than passing the turn will break the connection.
Each round you make a mental attack vs mental armor (MA).
Damage increment: 1d3
After the tenth round, you deal bonus damage equal to the total amount of damage you've done so far.
Range: sight
Cooldown: 80 rounds

mutations.name: Syphon Vim
mutations.description: You bond with a nearby organic creature and leech its life force.
mutations.levelText:
Mental attack versus an organic creature
Duration: 20 rounds
Cooldown: 200 rounds
Drains 1 hit point per round

mutations.name: Telepathy
mutations.description: You may communicate with others through the psychic aether.
mutations.levelText:
Chat with anyone in vision
Takes you much less time to issue orders to companions

mutations.name: Teleport Other
mutations.description: You teleport an adjacent creature to a random nearby location.
mutations.levelText: Cooldown: 105 rounds

mutations.name: Teleportation
mutations.description: You teleport to a nearby location.
mutations.levelText:
Teleport to a random location within a designated area.
Uncertainty radius: 12
Cooldown: 100 rounds

mutations.name: Temporal Fugue
mutations.description: You quickly pass back and forth through time creating multiple copies of yourself.
mutations.levelText:
Duration: 20 rounds
Copies: 1
Cooldown: 200 rounds

mutations.name: Time Dilation
mutations.description: You distort time around your person in order to slow down your enemies.
mutations.levelText:
Creatures within 9 tiles are slowed according to how close they are to you.
Duration: 15 rounds
Cooldown: 150 rounds
Distance 1: creatures receive a 57% Quickness penalty
Distance 4: creatures receive a 22% Quickness penalty
Distance 7: creatures receive a 3% Quickness penalty

mutations.name: Albino
mutations.description: Your skin, hair, and eyes are absent of pigment.
mutations.levelText: You regenerate hit points at one-fifth the usual rate in the daylight.

mutations.name: Amphibious
mutations.description: Your skin must be kept moist with fresh water.
mutations.levelText:
You pour water on yourself rather than drinking it to quench your thirst.
You require about two-thirds more water than usual.
+100 reputation with frogs

mutations.name: Brittle Bones
mutations.description: Your bones are brittle.
mutations.levelText: You suffer 50% more damage from bludgeoning attacks, falling, and other sources of concussive damage.

mutations.name: Carnivorous
mutations.description: You eat meat exclusively.
mutations.levelText:
You get no satiation from foods that aren't meat.
If you eat raw food that isn't meat, there's a 50% chance you become ill for 2 hours.
You can't cook with plant or fungus ingredients.
You don't get ill when you eat raw meat.
You can eat raw meat without being famished.

mutations.name: Cold Blooded
mutations.description: Your vitality depends on your temperature; at higher temperatures, you are more lively. At lower temperatures, you are more torpid.
mutations.levelText:
Your base quickness score is reduced by 10.
Your quickness increases as your temperature increases and decreases as your temperature decreases.
+100 reputation with unshelled reptiles.

mutations.name: Electromagnetic Impulse
mutations.description: You involuntarily release electromagnetic pulses, deactivating robots and artifacts around yourself.
mutations.levelText: Small chance each round you're in combat that you release an electromagnetic pulse with radius 3, deactivating robots and artifacts (including those you carry) for 11-20 rounds.

mutations.name: Hooks for Feet
mutations.description: You have hooks for feet.
mutations.levelText: You cannot wear shoes.

mutations.name: Irritable Genome
mutations.description: Your genome is irritable and unpredictable.
mutations.levelText:
Whenever you spend a mutation point, the next mutation point you gain will be spent randomly.
Whenever you buy a new mutation, you get a random one instead of a choice of three.

mutations.name: Myopic
mutations.description: You are nearsighted.
mutations.levelText: You can only see up to a radius of 10.

mutations.name: Nerve Poppy
mutations.description: You lack a developed sense of pain.
mutations.levelText: You only know your general state of health and not your precise number of hit points.

mutations.name: Spontaneous Combustion
mutations.description: You spontaneously erupt into flames.
mutations.levelText: Small chance each round you're in combat that you spontaneously erupt into flames.

mutations.name: Tonic Allergy
mutations.description: You are allergic to tonics.
mutations.levelText:
The chance your mutant physiology reacts adversely to a tonic is increased to 33%.
If you react adversely this way to a salve or ubernostrum tonic, the adverse reaction effect is chosen randomly from among other tonic effects. You will still heal.

mutations.name: Amnesia
mutations.description: You forget things and places.
mutations.levelText:
Whenever you learn a new secret, there's a small chance you forget a secret.
Whenever you return to a map you previously visited, there's a small chance you forget the layout.

mutations.name: Blinking Tic
mutations.description: You teleport about uncontrollably.
mutations.levelText: Small chance each round you're in combat that you randomly teleport to a nearby location.

mutations.name: Dystechnia
mutations.description: You are befuddled by technological complexity.
mutations.levelText:
You're much worse at examining artifacts.
You can't have artifacts identified for you because you don't understand their explanations.
When you fail severely during artifact examination, the artifact explodes.

mutations.name: Evil Twin
mutations.description: Acting on some inscrutable impulse, a parallel version of yourself travels through space and time to destroy you.
mutations.levelText: Each time you embark on a new location, there's a small chance your evil twin has tracked you there and attempts to kill you.

mutations.name: Narcolepsy
mutations.description: You fall asleep involuntarily from time to time.
mutations.levelText: Small chance each round you're in combat that you fall asleep for 20-29 rounds.

mutations.name: Psionic Migraines
mutations.description: You suffer from powerful psionic migraines that render your head extremely sensitive.
mutations.levelText: You can't wear hats or helmets.

mutations.name: Quantum Jitters
mutations.description: Your willful acts sometimes dent spacetime.
mutations.levelText: Whenever you use an activated ability, there's a small chance your focus slips and you dent spacetime in the local region, causing 1-2 spacetime vortices to appear. This chance increases the longer you go without using an activated ability.

mutations.name: Socially Repugnant
mutations.description: Others find it difficult to tolerate you in social settings.
mutations.levelText: -50 reputation with every faction
